description: UMD 4.12.6 is an update release of UMD 4. It includes new packages for ARGO AMS library and APEL SSM
releaseNotes: This release includes new packages for ARGO AMS library and APEL SSM
installationNotes: All products in UMD 4.12.6 were verified against EGI's current Quality Criteria. Installation and configuration notes are available in the EGI repository.
contact: For further information about the distribution, its goals and surrounding processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: operations (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release notes of this release, or the related documentation provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the EGI Helpdesk (https://ggus.eu/) to make a report.
knownIssues: Please visit https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/UMD-4:UMD-4.12.6 for known issues.
changeLog: This release includes new packages for ARGO AMS library and APEL SSM

products.name: apel.apel-ssm
products.description: Secure Stomp Messenger (SSM) is designed to simply send messages using the STOMP protocol. Messages are signed and may be encrypted during transit. Persistent queues should be used to guarantee delivery.

products.name: grnet.argo-ams-library
products.description: A simple library for interacting with the ARGO Messaging Service.
